items.name: static var hasBytesAvailable: CFStreamEventType
items.desc: The stream has bytes to be read.

items.name: static var canAcceptBytes: CFStreamEventType
items.desc: The stream can accept bytes for writing.

items.name: static var errorOccurred: CFStreamEventType
items.desc: An error has occurred on the stream.

items.name: static var endEncountered: CFStreamEventType
items.desc: The end of the stream has been reached.
